text: Germinal Peiro (born September 15, 1953 in Lézignan-Corbières, Aude) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented Dordogne's 4th constituency from 1997 to 2017 as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Aude Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Germinal Peiro
